name: Space Race (bigbosshardfacts)
description:
Space Race is a two player text-based game.

Players take turns 'board game'-style as they advance their Global Superpower closer to landing on the Moon.

Each player advances at random between six possible outcomes to determine how much distance they gain.

In-game headlines are based on real newspaper headlines from the era.

The game was built in Twine Sugarcane.
